p: Essential oils have been used since ancient times due to their biological properties. Many essential oils, in fact, are characterized by antioxidant properties [ 9]. For this reason, it will be used as a substitute for butylated hydroxyanisole and butylated hydroxytoluene (BHT), which are harmful to human health [ 9]. For this reason, essential oils from edible plants, alone or inserted in active packaging and edible coatings, may represent a valid instrument to prolong shelf life. Several research papers evidenced that Ferulago extracts and essential oils are characterized by antioxidant activity and are used as medicinal plants or food preservatives [ 10, 11, 12].
